db:select.db:sql: SELECT VEHICLE_NO,PICKUP_LOCATION,DROP_LOCATION,DRIVER_CONTACT,FARE,VEHICLE_TYPE,SEATS , RN FROM ( SELECT C.VEHICLE_NO, F.PICKUP_LOCATION , F.DROP_LOCATION, C.DRIVER_CONTACT , F.FARE , C.VEHICLE_TYPE , C.SEATS , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY F.FARE) AS RN FROM OLA_CABDETAILS C JOIN OLA_FAREDETAILS F ON C.VEHICLE_TYPE=F.VEHICLETYPE AND C.CURRENT_LOCATION=F.PICKUP_LOCATION WHERE F.PICKUP_LOCATION=:pickuplocation and F.DROP_LOCATION=:droplocation and F.VEHICLETYPE=:vehicletype and C.STATUS='Available' )WHERE RN=1

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- payload map ( payload , indexOfPayload01 ) -> { pickuplocation: payload.PICKUP_LOCATION , droplocation: payload.DROP_LOCATION, noofperson: payload.SEATS, vehicletype: payload.VEHICLE_TYPE, pickuptime: vars.pickuptime, passengername: vars.passengername, fare: payload.FARE, vehicleno: payload.VEHICLE_NO }

db:insert.db:sql: INSERT INTO OLA_BOOKINGS (PASSENGERNAME,VEHICLE_NO, VEHICLE_TYPE, PICKUP_LOCATION, DROP_LOCATION, STATUS, NO_OF_PERSON, FARE, PICKUPTIME) VALUES (:passengername, :vehicleno, :vehicletype,:pickuplocation , :droplocation, :status, :noofperson, :fare, :pickuptime)
db:insert.db:input-parameters: #[{ "passengername" : payload.passengername, "vehicleno" : payload.vehicleno, "vehicletype" : payload.vehicletype, "pickuplocation" : payload.pickuplocation, "droplocation" : payload.droplocation, "status" : vars.status, "noofperson" : payload.noofperson as Number, "fare" : payload.fare as Number, "pickuptime" : payload.pickuptime }]

db:update.db:sql: update OLA_cabdetails set status='Cab Booked' where vehicle_no=:vehicleno
